### Tender Notice
#### Vessel Life Extension for the CCGS Sir Wilfrid Laurier

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites tenders for a ship repair contractor to carry out the Vessel Modernization of the Canadian Coast Guard vessel, CCGS Sir Wilfrid Laurier.

**Reference Number:** WS4030180273-Doc4042734596

**Tender Closing Date:** June 23, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Time

**Contracting Entity:** PSPC, 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entities:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) and Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)

**Description:** The successful contractor will be required to complete a list of vessel modernization and repairs as contained in the Statement of Work for the project. The contractor will also be responsible for complying with all applicable laws and regulations, as well as meeting the Canadian Coast Guard's (CCG) quality and safety standards.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

* The successful contractor must have relevant experience and qualifications in ship repair and maintenance.
* The contractor must demonstrate a proven track record of completing projects on schedule and within budget.
* The contractor must meet the CCG's quality and safety standards and complies with all applicable laws and regulations.

**Evaluation Method:** The selection will be based on a competitive bidding process, with evaluation criteria including the most advantageous commercial offer.

**Trade Agreements:** The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this procurement.

### Important Dates

* June 23, 2023 - Tender Closing Date
* June 29, 2023 - Expected Contract Start Date

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Eric Zwarich at eric.zwarich@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. 

### Notice URL

The tender notice and any attachments can be found at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16516375?extsite=MTY1MTYzNzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
